/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
